00033 TableInfo::TableInfo(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr,
00034                      const TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr)

00040 void TableInfo::dump_range_table() {
00041   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00042   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); iter++) {
00043     cout << m_identifier.name << "[" << (*iter).second->start_row() << ".." << (*iter).second->end_row() << "]" << endl;
00044   }
00045 }

00050 bool TableInfo::get_range(const RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00051   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00052   string end_row = range->end_row;
00053 
00054   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00055 
00056   if (iter == m_range_map.end()) {
00057     std::cout << "TableInfo couldn't find end row (" << end_row << ")";
00058     for (iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); iter++)
00059       std::cout << "TableInfo map: " << (*iter).first << "\n";
00060     std::cout << flush;
00061     return false;
00062   }
00063 
00064   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00065 
00066   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00067 
00068   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row)) {
00069     std::cout << "TableInfo start row mismatch '" << start_row << "' != '" << range->start_row << "'" << endl;
00070     return false;
00071   }
00072 
00073   return true;
00074 }

00080 bool TableInfo::remove_range(const RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00081   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00082   string end_row = range->end_row;
00083 
00084   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00085 
00086   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00087     return false;
00088 
00089   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00090 
00091   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00092 
00093   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row))
00094     return false;
00095 
00096   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00097 
00098   return true;
00099 }

00106 void TableInfo::add_range(RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00107   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00108   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(range_ptr->end_row());
00109   assert(iter == m_range_map.end());
00110   m_range_map[range_ptr->end_row()] = range_ptr;
00111 }

00117 bool TableInfo::find_containing_range(std::string row, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00118   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00119 
00120   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.lower_bound(row);
00121 
00122   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00123     return false;
00124 
00125   if (row <= (*iter).second->start_row())
00126     return false;
00127 
00128   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00129 
00130   return true;
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 void TableInfo::get_range_vector(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec) {
00135   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00136   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); iter++)
00137     range_vec.push_back((*iter).second);
00138 }

00141 void TableInfo::clear() {
00142   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00143   m_range_map.clear();
00144 }

00150 TableInfo *TableInfo::create_shallow_copy() {
00151   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00152   return new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, &m_identifier, m_schema);
00153 }
